burn(uint256).details: Burns `tokenId`. See {ERC721-_burn}. Requirements: - The caller must own `tokenId` or be an approved operator.

returns._0: Whether or not the address is allowed to mint yet.
Token ID for the token owned by the given address.
Token URI for the given token by ID.
Semver contract version as a string.

BASE_URI_ATTESTATION_KEY().notice: Attestation key used by the attestor to attest the baseURI.

approve(address,uint256).notice: Disabled for the Optimist NFT (Soul Bound Token).

baseURI().notice: Returns the baseURI for all tokens.

isOnAllowList(address).notice: Checks OptimistAllowlist to determine whether a given address is allowed to mint         the Optimist NFT. Since the Optimist NFT will also be used as part of the         Citizens House, mints are currently restricted. Eventually anyone will be able         to mint.

mint(address).notice: Allows an address to mint an Optimist NFT. Token ID is the uint256 representation         of the recipient's address. Recipients must be permitted to mint, eventually anyone         will be able to mint. One token per address.

setApprovalForAll(address,bool).notice: Disabled for the Optimist NFT (Soul Bound Token).

tokenIdOfAddress(address).notice: Returns the token ID for the token owned by a given address. This is the uint256         representation of the given address.

tokenURI(uint256).notice: Returns the token URI for a given token by ID

version().notice: Returns the full semver contract version.

userdoc.notice: A Soul Bound Token for real humans only(tm).
